name: server-response-time
title: Initial server response time was short

name: efficient-animated-content
title: Use video formats for animated content

name: duplicated-javascript
title: Remove duplicate modules in JavaScript bundles

name: legacy-javascript
title: Avoid serving legacy JavaScript to modern browsers

name: uses-long-cache-ttl
title: Serve static assets with an efficient cache policy

name: font-display
title: Ensure text remains visible during webfont load

name: resource-summary
title: Keep request counts low and transfer sizes small

name: third-party-summary
title: Reduce the impact of third-party code

name: third-party-facades
title: Lazy load third-party resources with facades

name: lcp-lazy-loaded
title: Largest Contentful Paint image was not lazily loaded

name: uses-passive-event-listeners
title: Uses passive listeners to improve scrolling performance

name: unsized-images
title: Image elements do not have explicit `width` and `height`

name: viewport
title: Has a `<meta name="viewport">` tag with `width` or `initial-scale`

name: aria-allowed-attr
title: `[aria-*]` attributes do not match their roles

name: aria-hidden-body
title: `[aria-hidden="true"]` is not present on the document `<body>`

name: aria-hidden-focus
title: `[aria-hidden="true"]` elements do not contain focusable descendents

name: aria-input-field-name
title: ARIA input fields have accessible names

name: aria-required-children
title: Elements with an ARIA `[role]` that require children to contain a specific `[role]` have all required children.

name: aria-required-parent
title: `[role]`s are contained by their required parent element

name: aria-toggle-field-name
title: ARIA toggle fields have accessible names

name: aria-valid-attr
title: `[aria-*]` attributes are valid and not misspelled

name: bypass
title: The page contains a heading, skip link, or landmark region

name: color-contrast
title: Background and foreground colors do not have a sufficient contrast ratio.

name: definition-list
title: `<dl>`'s contain only properly-ordered `<dt>` and `<dd>` groups, `<script>`, `<template>` or `<div>` elements.

name: dlitem
title: Definition list items are wrapped in `<dl>` elements

name: duplicate-id-active
title: `[id]` attributes on active, focusable elements are unique

name: form-field-multiple-labels
title: No form fields have multiple labels

name: heading-order
title: Heading elements are not in a sequentially-descending order

name: html-has-lang
title: `<html>` element does not have a `[lang]` attribute

name: html-lang-valid
title: `<html>` element has a valid value for its `[lang]` attribute

name: image-alt
title: Image elements do not have `[alt]` attributes

name: link-name
title: Links do not have a discernible name

name: list
title: Lists contain only `<li>` elements and script supporting elements (`<script>` and `<template>`).

name: listitem
title: List items (`<li>`) are contained within `<ul>` or `<ol>` parent elements

name: meta-refresh
title: The document does not use `<meta http-equiv="refresh">`

name: meta-viewport
title: `[user-scalable="no"]` is not used in the `<meta name="viewport">` element and the `[maximum-scale]` attribute is not less than 5.

name: tabindex
title: No element has a `[tabindex]` value greater than 0

name: td-headers-attr
title: Cells in a `<table>` element that use the `[headers]` attribute refer to table cells within the same table.

name: th-has-data-cells
title: `<th>` elements and elements with `[role="columnheader"/"rowheader"]` have data cells they describe.

name: logical-tab-order
title: The page has a logical tab order

name: interactive-element-affordance
title: Interactive elements indicate their purpose and state

name: managed-focus
title: The user's focus is directed to new content added to the page

name: focus-traps
title: User focus is not accidentally trapped in a region

name: visual-order-follows-dom
title: Visual order on the page follows DOM order

name: offscreen-content-hidden
title: Offscreen content is hidden from assistive technology

name: use-landmarks
title: HTML5 landmark elements are used to improve navigation

name: external-anchors-use-rel-noopener
title: Links to cross-origin destinations are unsafe

name: geolocation-on-start
title: Avoids requesting the geolocation permission on page load

name: notification-on-start
title: Avoids requesting the notification permission on page load

name: no-vulnerable-libraries
title: Includes front-end JavaScript libraries with known security vulnerabilities

name: csp-xss
title: Ensure CSP is effective against XSS attacks

name: password-inputs-can-be-pasted-into
title: Allows users to paste into password fields

name: image-aspect-ratio
title: Displays images with correct aspect ratio

name: errors-in-console
title: No browser errors logged to the console

name: valid-source-maps
title: Missing source maps for large first-party JavaScript

name: inspector-issues
title: No issues in the `Issues` panel in Chrome Devtools

name: viewport
title: Has a `<meta name="viewport">` tag with `width` or `initial-scale`

name: http-status-code
title: Page has successful HTTP status code

name: link-text
title: Links do not have descriptive text

name: image-alt
title: Image elements do not have `[alt]` attributes

name: tap-targets
title: Tap targets are not sized appropriately

name: pwa-score
title: Overall Progressive Web App Category Score

name: installable-manifest
title: Web app manifest or service worker do not meet the installability requirements

name: service-worker
title: Does not register a service worker that controls page and `start_url`

name: splash-screen
title: Is not configured for a custom splash screen

name: themed-omnibox
title: Does not set a theme color for the address bar.

name: content-width
title: Content is sized correctly for the viewport

title: Has a `<meta name="viewport">` tag with `width` or `initial-scale`

name: maskable-icon
title: Manifest doesn't have a maskable icon
